Title: Bobasoft Framework
Description: Contains own light IoC, many helpers and extensions. Also in Presentation project, useful converters, actions, base view model implementation
HomeWiki:
Bobasoft Framework

Update: 05/12/12 v0.5.2 is available. Also added wpf example project


About:

This is set of helpful classes.

Includes:
IoC + lightweight dependency resolver implementation (not external libraries needed)

For Xaml:
- set of converters:
VisibilityConverter
EnumConverter
DateTimeConverter
- ModelBase class
- ObservableObject
- Command
- ObservableDictionary

Tags: helpers, ioc, azure, sl, mongodb
